name: AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_viewOrManageReferenceTemplateSettings
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!searchText: rule!AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text'
  ),
  local!selectedTemplate: rule!AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable(
    type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_Template'
  ),
  local!triggerRefresh: rule!AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable(
    type: rule!AS_CO_TYPE_Datetime()
  ),
  local!showHistory: false,
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
      local!selectedTemplate
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_viewReferenceTemplates(
      triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
      selectedTemplate: local!selectedTemplate,
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      searchText: local!searchText,
      showHistory: local!showHistory
    ),
    if(
      local!showHistory,
      rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_viewTemplateHistory(
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        selectedTemplate: local!selectedTemplate,
        showHistory: local!showHistory,
        subHeaderBundleKey: "lbl_TemplateHistory",
        backBundleKey: "lbl_BackToTemplates",
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_manageReferenceTemplate(
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        selectedTemplate: local!selectedTemplate,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      )
    )
  )
)
